thoughts: Is proud of their work as c_n's mediator, and hopes that they leave behind a legacy of peace
Is a bit exasperated upon watching c_n cats' arguments
Is proud to see {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} negotiated treaties still in effect
Hopes the clan can get by without their guidance
Misses friends from outside the clans
Finds that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} still have work to do in the afterlife
Can't believe how much dead cats quarrel
Is saddened that a treaty they helped to form is over
